comments.body: NOTE: This file is roughly a copy of `fluentd-gcp-configmap.yaml`. The only difference is whether to set up `local_resource_id` and enable talking to Metadata Agent. With those, logs are ingested against `k8s_container` and `k8s_node`. Without those, logs are ingested against `gke_container` and `gce_instance`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@# This ConfigMap is used to ingest logs against old resources like
# "gke_container" and "gce_instance" when $LOGGING_STACKDRIVER_RESOURCE_TYPES is
# set to "old".
